subject: p12433421
History: Pulmonary edema, left base opacity, evaluation for interval changes.
Findings: Compared to the previous radiograph, there is mild increase in extent of bilateral pleural effusions. As a consequence, the retrocardiac atelectasis has also increased. Subtle signs indicative of mild fluid overload. No evidence of pneumonia. Unchanged right internal jugular vein catheter.
